ygData.subject: Re: Shadowstep-Gate Success Stories??
ygData.msgSnippet: Another question on Shadow Step Can i use it to get down from the tree platforms in Kelethin or down a cliff face? (I know the result would be random) I have
ygData.messageBody:
Another question on Shadow Step

Can i use it to get down from the tree platforms in Kelethin or down a cliff
face? (I know the result would be random) I have been tempted to try this
but am afraid of heights. (Actually im afraid of falling not heights :P )

Also do you end up on top of the water (If you shadow step into a lake or
ocean) or on the bottom (ie ground)

Havil
10th circle Wizard
Servant of Mithaniel Marr
Bristlbain Server


-----Original Message-----
From: Jay Hollums <jhollums@...>
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Date: Friday, April 23, 1999 4:10 PM
Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: Shadowstep-Gate Success Stories??


>From: "Jay Hollums" <jhollums@...>
>
>This is absolutely true :)
>
>PS I have Faded into water before... be careful of sharks when near water
>and casting this spell.
>
>
>
>> I have done some experimenting with S.Step and distances and this is what
>>I have found. You can only go as far as you can see in a flat line. In
>> otherwords, if you are in a dungeon, or in a valley, you will no no
>>further than you can see, or somewhere else in the bottom of the valley.
If you
>>are standing on a hill peak though, or on a high flat spot in the middle
of
>>the desert where you can see for a long distance, you will go MUCH
further.
